translations: v.节省，吝惜（stint 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: She never stints on the food at her parties.
sentences.translation: 她举办聚会吃的东西从不小气。

sentences.sentence: This means piloting stints of some four to five days at a time.
sentences.translation: 这意味着每次飞行要限制在4到5天里。

sentences.sentence: UKCMRI will provide them with generous financial support for up to two six-year stints.
sentences.translation: 中心将会为他们提供慷慨的财政援助，以支持其多达两个的为期六年的项目。
